user.title: CronoStar Setup
user.description:

### What will be done:

enable_packages.title: Enable Packages
enable_packages.description:
CronoStar requires the 'packages' feature enabled in Home Assistant. 

We will attempt to add the following block to your `configuration.yaml`:
```yaml
homeassistant:
  packages: !include_dir_named packages
```
Proceed?

confirm_setup.title: Finalize Setup
confirm_setup.description:
Environment analysis complete.
- Automation configuration: **{automation_status}**
- Directory structure: **Ready**

Click 'Submit' to create folders and initial files. After this, you can add the CronoStar card to your dashboard.
